thread.title: Gold Closes Slightly Higher as Treasury Yields Fall

author: David Hodari
title: Gold Closes Slightly Higher as Treasury Yields Fall
text:
Gold prices swung between small gains and losses before closing slightly higher Friday, helped by a drop in Treasury yields.
Front-month gold for May delivery closed up 0.2% to $1,290.20 a troy ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange but still capped off its worst week of the year. Bets on higher interest rates have pushed up Treasury yields and the dollar recently, hurting gold because a stronger dollar makes the precious metal more expensive for overseas buyers, and higher bond yields make gold less...
